Name: Si-Mao
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Shot glass .
Review: A whiskey laced shot with a hint of banana.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2010 at Nobu Berkeley, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Si-Mao contains 118 calories
